    Current


    Working as a Software Development Engineering Intern at Amazon. I am also a graduate student at University of California, Davis, CS Department where I am pursuing Masters of Science in Computer Science. Prior to my masters, I was working as a Software Developer for a period of 3 years at SAP Labs, Bangalore, India. I completed my undergraduation at Pune Institute Of Computer Technology (affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University).

    My interests are in the field of Distributed Systems with a focus on Consensus Protocols and scaling distributed systems. Apart from that, I love to automate small things to speed up my tasks and make a stream lined process in order to have consistency in my work. Just out of curiosity, I also like to build small web applications, in order to stay in touch with the latest technologies.

    Whats next?


    Well my ultimate aim would be start a company of my own someday that would disrupt the world and directl make an impact of peoples life. For time being, I would like to learn the art of Software Development as much as I can to develop some of the best softwares.

    On a personal note


    Apart from my regular CS Stuff, I enjoy cooking in my spare time and love making some interesting sandwiches. I love being in and around nature, lakes especially, and hence travel from time to time to explore the world as much as I can. I like reading books and have read over 50+ books in the past 3 years.
